Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Add images to your Copilot prompts in M365 applications chat in government clouds
Description:
This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience. Add images now to Copilot chat in applications of Word, PowerPoint, Excel, OneNote and Outlook. Available to government cloud (GCC) environments. Ask questions about a picture or screenshot, extract text from an image, identify key takeaways from a chart or table, translate image information into copy, ask for suggestions on how to improve content, or generate alt text.
GA date: June CY2025
